installation.name: AC - Battery Disconnection Procedure WMS
installation.description: Step-by-step procedure for the disconnection and reconnection of the locomotive batteries on AutoHaul locomotives.

tasks.name: Sign on to permit of isolation and lock on
tasks.description: Inspect Locomotive entry points. Ensure roads are locked out, locomotive isolated, and safe working protection in place. Refer to Isolation matrix and secure entry walkways.

metadata.notes: Ask Permit Isolation Officer or Administrator if unsure. Watch for trips/falls.

tasks.name: Preparation â€“ Mandatory
tasks.description: Follow all WMS steps for safe and efficient completion of task.

metadata.components: Platform ladder, container for nuts/bolts, battery rattle gun, impact socket, gloves, safety glasses, spanners, cable ties, hearing protection
metadata.notes: Refer to components tab for materials, tools, equipment.

tasks.name: Flick all breakers off and pull knife switches
tasks.description: Confirm polarity of BCCB breaker, attach info tag, turn off ECP panel breakers, pull knife switches.

metadata.notes: Complete Take 5 for confirming BCCB polarity.

tasks.name: Test voltage across diode and earth
tasks.description: Check capacitor voltage, turn BCCB breaker ON to dissipate energy, re-test, place info tag.

tasks.name: Place personal lock on knife switch door hasp
tasks.description: Ensure master lock secures knife switch door; eliminates risk of load on circuits when batteries connect.

tasks.name: Locate battery cover panels and position platform ladder
tasks.description: Ensure task can be done comfortably without overreaching.

tasks.name: Remove nuts and washers per panel
tasks.description: Remove nuts from bottom to top; store nuts/washers in labeled container.

metadata.notes: Label container with loco number; no spare parts.

tasks.name: Remove panels
tasks.description: Label panels with loco number, store on correct storage shelf.

tasks.name: Remove negative battery terminal
tasks.description: Disconnect negative terminal first; secure lug with cable tie to avoid accidental contact.

metadata.notes: Critical to disconnect negative first to prevent short circuit.

tasks.name: Remove positive battery terminal
tasks.description: Disconnect positive terminal, secure lug, store hardware in container.

metadata.notes: Notify QC agents 30 min before completion.

tasks.name: Leading hand quality check
tasks.description: Verify all prior steps completed before contacting QC Team; sign-off in system.

tasks.name: Final Quality Check (ASTS and Calibre)
tasks.description: ASTS QC Inspector and Calibre representative jointly inspect and sign off.
